H0.text: In Greek Mythology who was the princess rescued from the Sea Monster by Perseus. Amphitrite

H1.text: In Greek Mythology who was the princess rescued from the Sea Monster by Perseus. Ariadne

H2.text: In Greek Mythology who was the princess rescued from the Sea Monster by Perseus. Callisto

H3.text: In Greek Mythology who was the princess rescued from the Sea Monster by Perseus. Andromena

A4.text: Andromeda is set to be sacrificed to the kraken but is saved by Perseus.

A5.text: Perseus finds her as he is coming back from his quest to decapitate Medusa, and brings her back to Greece to marry her and let her reign as his queen.
